Package com.aeonium.javafx.validation.exceptions

This package contains the APPI specific exceptions.

See: Description

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FXValidatorException
    Runtime exception, indicating severe problems or misuse of the API.
    ValidationException
    Base exception for signalling validation errors â€“ a validator derived from FXAbstractValidator must throw this exception in it's FXAbstractValidator.validate(javafx.scene.control.Control, java.lang.annotation.Annotation) method, if the validation failed and the property FXAbstractValidator.isValid has been set to false.

Package com.aeonium.javafx.validation.exceptions Description

This package contains the APPI specific exceptions. Currently, there are no types that should be used, i.e., thrown by the users of the API, except if you extend the library yourself.
